Good morning ,

Today I went to the Ouled Saleh agency to make a money withdrawal, with my national identity card at 12:00 p.m.
On arrival a security agent asks me the purpose of my visit, I tell him 'a withdrawal', he replies 'revealed', I specify "no, withdrawal", and I translate into Arabic 'bghite ntiri l flous ', there he asks me to wait outside in the blazing heat...I wait exactly an hour (knowing that I have serious health problems) before entering and when my turn arrives, I present my national card to the customer service representative and asks her for a withdrawal, there she takes the card and after tapping on her computer, almost throws the card in front of me, and says to me in a loud and inappropriate tone "no no no, today I only serve local, go find a large agency we don't have enough liquidity" then I answer him "I don't understand, it's an operation that I'm used to doing" , she said to me “yes but today no", I tell her "ok you can give me how much", she tells me "nothing", I tell her "do you think it's normal that I wait an hour for that", there she responds 'a really loud tone "I don't know what you are waiting for, ana 3i kheddama hena, go next..", I say ok I want to speak to the director, she tells me, he has gone to pray.

I apologize if I was long, I don't want to harm anyone, so I relay the facts as they happened and leave it to you to judge.
If I have to summarize:
Why explain the purpose of my visit to a security guard?
Why am I being refused a service provided by my bank?
Why am I experiencing this humiliation from a so-called account manager?

Note that another incident preceded this one, where in the same agency, a security agent told me that the system is down and when I insisted on entering, a customer service representative told him "don't no one comes home, aw syeda ma tghedach", it was 2 p.m....
